text: The men's 400 metre freestyle S8 event at the 2016 Paralympic Games took place on 8 September, at the Olympic Aquatics Stadium. Two heats were held, both with six swimmers. The swimmers with the eight fastest times advanced to the final. ==Records== , the existing World and Paralympic records were as follows. {| class="wikitable" |- |World record | |4:23.76 |Sheffield, Great Britain |30 July 2016 |- |Paralympic record | |4:26.25 |Beijing, China |9 September 2008 |- |2016 World leading | |4:23.76 |Sheffield, Great Britain |30 July 2016 |} ==Heats== ===Heat 1=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:center" |- !
